title: Anna_Calvi-One_Breath-2013-C4
description:
Anna Calvi - One Breath


        Label.........................: Domino
        Genre.........................: Indie
        StoreDate.....................: Oct-08-2013
        Source........................: CDDA
        Grabber.......................: Exact Audio Copy (Secure Mode)
        Encoding Scheme...............: Lame 3.98.4 V0 VBR Joint-Stereo
        Size..........................: 66.05 MB
        Total Playing Time............: 39:12

        Release Notes:

        Domino is pleased to announce the release of One Breath, the new album
        from Anna Calvi on October 8th. One Breath is a bold and confident
        record that begins an exciting new chapter in this uniquely talented
        artist's career.

        Produced by John Congleton in Blackbox Studios, France and mixed in
        Dallas, Texas, USA, One Breath was written in a year and recorded over a
        few intense weeks.

        One Breath is a more personal record than its Mercury and Brit nominated
        predecessor. Reflective and vulnerable, it strikes a balance between
        optimism and despair, beauty and ugliness. The fiery elements of Anna's
        debut remain, but One Breath is more instinctive and urgent, revealing a
        wider spectrum of textures and emotion.

        "One Breath is the moment before you've got to open yourself up, and
        it's about how terrifying that is. It's scary and it's thrilling. It's
        also full of hope, because whatever has to happen hasn't happened yet."
        - Anna Calvi
